mapper.select: select distinct F_TBR_NAME from w_gzrz1 where F_TBRQ BETWEEN #{date1} and #{date2} AND (INST_STATUS_="SUCCESS_END" OR INST_STATUS_="RUNNING") ORDER BY ID_ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE os_user SET STATUS_ ='IN_JOB' WHERE USER_NO_ =#{username} AND TENANT_ID_ ='1'
UPDATE sys_account SET STATUS_ ='ENABLED' WHERE NAME_ =#{username} AND TENANT_ID_='1'
mapper.select: SELECT ID_, F_XM, F_LYGW, F_LYBM, F_RZRQ, F_HTQX, F_LYXZ, F_HY_NAME, F_XL, F_SY_NAME, F_ZY, F_SFZH, F_BYXX, F_HJDZ, F_BYSJ, F_JZDZ, F_LXDH, F_YJLXR, F_YJLXFS, F_TXRQ FROM w_luysqd WHERE PARENT_ID_ IS NULL AND INST_STATUS_='SUCCESS_END'
SELECT ID_, F_XM, F_LYGW, F_LYBM, F_RZRQ, F_HTQX, F_LYXZ, F_HY_NAME, F_XL, F_SY_NAME, F_ZY, F_SFZH, F_BYXX, F_HJDZ, F_BYSJ, F_JZDZ, F_LXDH, F_YJLXR, F_YJLXFS, F_TXRQ FROM w_luysqd WHERE ID_=#{id}
